name: Legions of Tyrandel
description: Legions of Tyrandel is a competitive turn based strategy card game. In this game, the cards in your deck become units under your direct control when you play them. Use clever combinations and good positioning to triumph over your opponent and lead your army to victory!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Graphics card supporting DX9 (Shader model 3.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Minimum requirements are made from assumptions, and are not fully tested.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 or above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB Graphics card (Nvidia GTX 960 or comparable) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
